backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing autogenerated short descriptions of many frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode variants, and global background/text bindings.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading fonts and the React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup using TanStack Router with routes for initialization, dashboard, logs, summary, reality check, history, and stats.
frontend/src/components/charts/RealityPi: Pie chart component visualizing dev vs non‑dev hours and distraction categories using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/charts/WeeklyCha: Bar chart displaying last 7 days of dev hours computed from stored logs.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper providing a main content area and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Fixed bottom navigation bar showing tabs for Home, Reality, History, and Stats with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/reality/NonDevLo: Form for adding non‑dev activity logs with activity type, duration, category, mood, and notes, persisting via saveLog.
frontend/src/components/reality/RealityA: Displays weekly distraction data, most common distraction, and discipline score using logs and analytics utilities.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Renders a banner showing a time‑based motivational reminder.
frontend/src/components/settings/ResetCo: Provides a confirmation dialog to reset all app data and redirect to initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutosave.ts: Implements debounced autosaving with status tracking for changed data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, fonts, and cyberpunk‑themed Tailwind CSS variables and utilities.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Provides functions to compute distraction totals, common distractions, and discipline scores from logs.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Contains static UI copy strings for labels, headings, and messages.
frontend/src/lib/dates.ts: Offers date utilities for formatting, parsing, day tracking, and time‑of‑day detection.
frontend/src/lib/quotes.ts: Returns a deterministic daily motivational quote based on a date key.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Generates a reminder message based on current time of day.
frontend/src/lib/scoring.ts: Calculates daily performance metrics and discipline status from dev logs.
frontend/src/lib/stats.ts: Computes aggregate dev log statistics, streaks, and 30‑day discipline percentage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DailySummaryPage.tsx: Displays today's dev summary with hours, relevance, focus rating, and performance message.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows daily progress, discipline status, quote, and navigation to log sections and tools.
frontend/src/pages/DevLogPage.tsx: Provides a form to create or edit a dev log entry with autosave and section‑based navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Allows browsing past logs by date with summaries, day number, and detailed accordion views.
frontend/src/pages/InitializePage.tsx: Initializes the app by selecting a dev path and start date before entering the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/RealityCheckPage.tsx: Page showing today's dev vs non-dev hours, percentage comparison, and time distribution chart with option to add non-dev logs.
frontend/src/pages/StatsGrowthPage.tsx: Page displaying long-term stats, streaks, hours, relevance, and badge unlocking with charts.
frontend/src/state/badges.ts: Hook managing badge state, loading from storage and unlocking badges based on streak and hour stats.
frontend/src/state/devLogs.ts: Hook storing segmented dev logs per day with functions to save, fetch, and total hours.
frontend/src/state/nonDevLogs.ts: Hook storing non-dev activity logs per day with functions to save entries and compute daily totals.
frontend/src/state/storage.ts: LocalStorage wrapper handling persistence of app initialization, logs, path, dates, and badges.
frontend/src/state/useAppState.ts: Hook managing global app initialization state, start date, dev path, and reset behavior.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the cyberpunk UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata outlining app goals, UI theme, data model, and required assets.
